players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is dead, which means one of you three is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 4 players total, one wrong vote could lose us the game."
You: "I agree with Diana; we must be cautious. I suggest we observe each other's behavior closely today before making any accusations."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso—I investigated her last night. We must vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
You: "Alice would never admit to being the mafioso so easily. Charlie's quick accusation seems suspicious—maybe he's trying to divert attention from himself."
Charlie: "Alice, denying your guilt so quickly only makes you look more suspicious. Diana, we should trust my investigation and vote to arrest Alice now."

Diana: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, your quick accusation makes sense. But Alice, your defense seems genuine too. This is exactly the difficult situation we're in - one wrong vote loses the game."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
